meanings.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
meanings.sent1: I measured the flour in grams for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scale showed the weight in grams.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried a few grams of sugar back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him weighed more than a thousand grams of gold.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that a few grams of medicine would be enough to help.
